trans-unit.source: What would you like to do?
trans-unit.target: What would you like to do?

trans-unit.source: VC_Framework can delete exported methods that you delete in 4D in real time. This is normally done every <!--#4DTEXT String(<>VC_DeleteProcDelay_l/60)--> seconds. However because of the complexity of your database, you may perceive a ~<!--#4DTEXT VC_DELETE_Average_t-->ms hang in design mode every <!--#4DTEXT String(<>VC_DeleteProcDelay_l/60)--> seconds. Alternatively VC_Framework can run the delete code only when the database stamp changes, instead of real time.
trans-unit.target: VC_Framework can delete exported methods that you delete in 4D in real time. This is normally done every <!--#4DTEXT String(<>VC_DeleteProcDelay_l/60)--> seconds. However because of the complexity of your database, you may perceive a ~<!--#4DTEXT VC_DELETE_Average_t-->ms hang in design mode every <!--#4DTEXT String(<>VC_DeleteProcDelay_l/60)--> seconds. Alternatively VC_Framework can run the delete code only when the database stamp changes, instead of real time.
